mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC
mapper.select: select t_alliance.*,COUNT(children.id)+1 as team_count,kid.alliance_name as invitorName,kid.alliance_phone as invitorPhone from t_alliance left JOIN t_alliance as children on t_alliance.id=children.invitor_alliance_id LEFT JOIN t_alliance kid ON t_alliance.invitor_alliance_id=kid.id where t_alliance.id=#{id} GROUP BY t_alliance.id

select (case when t_alliance.alliance_ship=0 or t_alliance.alliance_ship=3 or t_alliance.alliance_ship=2 or t_alliance.alliance_ship=6 then ((case when t_wallet.balance is NULL then t_alliance.alliance_inventory_amount else t_wallet.balance end) ) else (0 ) end ) as balance,if(t_alliance.alliance_ship=0,datediff(DATE_ADD(t_alliance.alliance_ship_time,INTERVAL (select value from t_config_field where field='experience_time') MONTH),now()) ,0) as experienceTime, DATE_ADD((select STR_TO_DATE(VALUE,'%Y-%m-%d') from t_config_field where field='starting_time') ,INTERVAL (select value from t_config_field where field='settlement_cycle' ) MONTH) as cutOffTime, t_alliance.*,COUNT(children.id)+1 as team_count,kid.alliance_name as invitorName,kid.alliance_phone as invitorPhone, t_user.avatar as wechatAvatar, t_user.name as wechatNick from t_alliance left JOIN t_alliance as children on t_alliance.id=children.invitor_alliance_id LEFT JOIN t_alliance kid ON t_alliance.invitor_alliance_id=kid.id LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_alliance.user_id = t_user.id LEFT JOIN t_wallet on t_wallet.user_id=t_alliance.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND t_alliance.alliance_type= #{record.allianceType}
AND t_alliance.alliance_ship = #{record.allianceShip}
AND t_alliance.alliance_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceStatus},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_inventory_amount LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceInventoryAmount},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_point LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.alliancePoint},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceName},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_sex LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceSex},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_occupation LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceOccupation},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_industry LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceIndustry},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceAddress},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_business LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceBusiness},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_hobby LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceHobby},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.alliancePhone},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_dob LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceDob},'%')
AND t_alliance.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_alliance.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime)
AND t_alliance.end_time <= DATE(#{record.startingCycle)
AND t_alliance.end_time <= DATE(#{record.balance)
AND t_alliance.end_time <= DATE(#{record.age)
AND （t_alliance.alliance_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_alliance.alliance_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')）
GROUP BY t_alliance.id order by t_alliance.creation_time desc

select (case when t_alliance.alliance_ship=0 or t_alliance.alliance_ship=3 then ((case when t_wallet.balance is NULL then t_alliance.alliance_inventory_amount else t_wallet.balance end) ) else (0 ) end ) as balance, DATE_ADD((select STR_TO_DATE(VALUE,'%Y-%m-%d') from t_config_field where field='starting_time') ,INTERVAL (select value from t_config_field where field='settlement_cycle' ) MONTH) as cutOffTime, t_alliance.*,COUNT(children.id)+1 as team_count,kid.alliance_name as invitorName,kid.alliance_phone as invitorPhone, t_user.avatar as wechatAvatar, t_user.name as wechatNick from t_alliance left JOIN t_alliance as children on t_alliance.id=children.invitor_alliance_id LEFT JOIN t_alliance kid ON t_alliance.invitor_alliance_id=kid.id LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_alliance.user_id = t_user.id LEFT JOIN t_wallet on t_wallet.user_id=t_alliance.user_id WHERE 1=1 and t_alliance.alliance_ship=0 and t_alliance.alliance_status > 0

AND t_alliance.alliance_sex LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceSex},'%')

AND t_alliance.alliance_industry LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceIndustry},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceAddress},'%')

AND t_alliance.alliance_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.alliancePhone},'%')
AND t_alliance.alliance_dob LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allianceDob},'%')

AND t_alliance.end_time <= DATE(#{record.startingCycle)
